name: BMO Global Communications Index ETF
longDescription: The ETF seeks to replicate, to the extent possible, the performance of a communication services index, net of expenses. Currently, the ETF seeks to replicate the performance of the Solactive Media and Communications Index (the Index). The investment strategy of the ETF is to invest in and hold the constituent securities of the Index in the same proportion as they are reflected in the Index. The Manager may also use a sampling methodology in selecting investments for the ETF. As an alternative to or in conjunction with investing in and holding all or some of the constituent securities of the Index, the ETF may invest in or use Other Securities (as defined in the prospectus) to obtain exposure to the performance of the Index.

fullAddress: 43rd Floor, 100 King Street West, Toronto, ON, CA
